channel.title: CVE Feed for ikiwiki -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ikiwiki -- all products

item.title: CVE-2017-0356|2024-08-05T13:03:56.572Z -- ikiwiki -- ikiwiki
item.description: A flaw, similar to to CVE-2016-9646, exists in ikiwiki before 3.20170111, in the passwordauth plugin's use of CGI::FormBuilder, allowing an attacker to bypass authentication via repeated parameters.
